summary: Mr. Naser Izadi and Mrs. Izadi were invited to Brazil by an agent from tourism agency. Angela (a Brazilian woman) misunderstood Naser as her ex-fiance and this make a challenging event for their trip.
cast: Alireza Abbasi|Reza Attaran|Bri Fiocca|Mehdi Mehrabi|Yekta Naser|Rivaldo|Reza Tiregar|Carol Vidotti
title: I am not Salvador
